page.title: 11BMX Track W. Grove
page.content: Bicycle Moto Cross racing started in England 6 years ago. 2 years ago a committee of 12 parents began to prepare a track on Wasborough Fields paid for by Grove and Wantage Councils and by grants from the local Sports Council. Mr. Eddings is the overall organiser. On July 15th 1984, the committee launched the first BMX race meeting. The 180-190 local members meet officially once a month. All members are insured and ages range from 5+ - 16+ and then a 25+. Meetings are at 3 levels, Open Meetings (local), Regional (S. Central England) and National. The biggest Grove event so far, was on May 6th (450) riders and this was a Regional Meeting. Trophies given by sponsors are presented to winners. BMX bikes can cost from Â£80 -Â£400 and protective suits are Â£30 - Â£40.
